attributes.action: All girls should be allowed to wear leggings instead of tights at school
attributes.additional_details: Because girls need to be comfortable while in school to learn
attributes.background: Let girls be more comfortable in school uniform as tights may be uncomfortable for some students and teachers scold students for wearing leggings even though it does not effect our learning capability.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require schools prioritise comfort in uniforms & more personal choice for pupils
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751980
